1341060.name: Half-Life 2: Genry's Great Escape From City 13
1341060.description:
Half-Life 2: Genry's Great Escape From City 13 is a free custom modification for Half-life 2.

The game takes place a month before the events of Half-life 2. The mod is an action, with often changing locations and first-person shooter.

The length of the game - 35/40 minutes.

“Do not take this mod as something serious or very high quality. The mod does not pretend to be anything” - Kirill Bulavintsev, author of the mod.

Special thanks to Maxim Belyaev, Nikita Fedorov and Kristina Kovaleva.

Feel the unique experience in the new modification from Kirill Bulavintsev - Requiem Of Science.
1341060.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 丹麦语, 繁体中文, 简体中文, 韩语, 荷兰语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 俄语, 泰语, 芬兰语, 瑞典语, 日语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
